items.title: AI comes alive: From bartenders to surgical aides to puppies, tomorrow’s robots are on their way
items.description: Beyond performing tasks, machines will integrate into our social fabric, requiring us to navigate new relationships with technology.

items.title: Anthropomorphizing AI: Dire consequences of mistaking human-like for human have already emerged
items.description: Anthropomorphizing AI creates dangerous blind spots in business decision-making beyond simple operational inefficiencies.

items.title: Microsoft AutoGen v0.4: A turning point toward more intelligent AI agents for enterprise developers
items.description: AutoGen represents Microsoft’s latest attempt to address the challenges of building multi-agent systems for enterprise applications. This article expl...

items.title: Beyond RAG: How cache-augmented generation reduces latency, complexity for smaller workloads
items.description: As LLMs become more capable, many RAG applications can be replaced with cache-augmented generation that include documents in the prompt.

items.title: Runway’s new AI image generator Frames is here, and it looks fittingly cinematic
items.description: The model excels in rendering advanced textures, natural lighting and complex compositions, providing more flexibility.
